article.title: POST /{db}/_all_docs
article.description: Retrieve specified documents from the database

introduction.paragraph: This request retrieves specified documents from the database.

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
The message body is a JSON document that contains the following object:

row.entry: List of identifiers of the documents to retrieve

unordered-list.list-item:
Content-Type—The value can be:
application/json text/plain; charset=utf–8

body.paragraph: The message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects:

row.entry: Starting index of the returned rows.
Array of row objects. Each row contains the following objects: id, key, and value. The value object contains the revision identifier in a rev object.
Number of documents in the database.This number is not the number of rows returned.

body.paragraph: The following request retrieves specified documents from the database named cookbook.
